divs: Sighting DetailsWe were at lake erie fishing at about 1:30am when i observed ing the sky with my fiance 1 object that appeared to look like a star in the sky changing colors but it started to move very fast but in a weird path turning and changing direction very quickand i started to get worried so i told my fiance lets pack up because i have never seen nothing like it in my 25 years of living. I looked around and i seen 3 of the a little distanve away. They changed colors and went lighter and dimmer at moments but the were moving about in the sky as if they were studying something. We sat and watched them for about an hour and they would appear and disappear and reappear. Im just worried that something is going to happen with these things in the sky.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Lorain
There were no other sightings in Lorain on or around September 25th 2011
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
Summary: Plusating at times but 3 in the sky changing direction very quick
